price: Namni (hanga) madaala atomii hamtuu dalages isuma arga.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
